name: English Software
overview:
Jane from EnglishSoftware.org is dedicated to provide the most comprehensive information about the latest English grammar and English writing software on the market. Jane is an experienced software marketing and sales professional with comprehensive knowledge and know-how in the software industry.

In her constant strive for innovative and effective products on the writing market, Jane discovered the potential of advanced grammar and writing tools while developing marketing content, writing sales letters or writing study documents, case studies, press releases, various web contents like blog posts, sales letters and many more.

Finally, Jane to promote those tools herselves in order to help both native and non-native English speakers finding the truly professional, cost-effective software solutions they deserve. Solutions which not only save time and money, but which help to create a professional, reputable, trustworthy image as reflected through writing.
